name: Prerequisite
content:
Prerequisite


Required Configuration Settings

To operate the system as intended, configure the following settings:

1. Credential

Add the OpenAI API key to the credentials section with the following details:

  • Key: Openai_Api (Fixed value)
  • Title: Openai-Api (Fixed value)
  • Value: [OpenAI API key] (Replace this with OpenAI API key)

Add the Gemini API key to the credentials section with the following details:

  • Key: Gemini_Api(Fixed value)
  • Title: Gemini_Api_Key (Fixed value)
  • Value: [Gemini API key] (Replace this with Gemini API key)


Path to add credentials:

Navigate to Settings > Credentials > Add Credentials.


2. Variable

Specify the fire-data path in the variables section with the following details:

  • Key: genaiHome (Fixed value)
  • Value: [Path to the fire-data directory from the home] (Example: /home/sparkflows/fire-data )

Path to add variables:

Navigate to Settings > Variables > Add Variables.


Accurate configuration of these settings is essential for proper system functionality.
